Game.Name: Beyblade V-Force - Ultimate Blader Jam (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
Game.plot: A sinister group is stealing Bit Beasts from the World Champion Bladebreakers and you must help defend against this mysterious force, using skill, balance, and endurance. Play as any Bladebreakers--including Tyson and Kai, and call upon your best strategies and mightiest Bit Beasts. Unlock more than 100 Beyblade collectibles as you fight through 50 Vforce challenges. It's a battle with the best Bladebreakers in the world, so make sure you've got the fighting spirit.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/917964.htmlCheat: Cheat CodesYou can only enter these codes one at a time at the pause screen when you're playing.
Game.Notes: A sinister group is stealing Bit Beasts from the World Champion Bladebreakers and you must help defend against this mysterious force, using skill, balance, and endurance. Play as any Bladebreakers--including Tyson and Kai, and call upon your best strategies and mightiest Bit Beasts. Unlock more than 100 Beyblade collectibles as you fight through 50 Vforce challenges. It's a battle with the best Bladebreakers in the world, so make sure you've got the fighting spirit.
